body_html:
@caisq @jhseu The hardcoding of the objects into the generator script is definitely a shortcoming, and the data is baked into the containers, but aside from that what are the other shortcomings of this test?

I ask because I'm totally new to tensorflow, and was trying to prototype a kubernetes third party resource to help developers quickly create training clusters: https://github.com/elsonrodriguez/tensorsets

What's a better script/test to base this type of automation on?
